snippet: Bobby Ryan, Mika Zibanejad and Kyle Turris each had a goal and an assist, Erik Karlsson added a career-high four assists, and the Ottawa Senators beat the Blue Jackets, 7-3, in Columbus, Ohio.
abstract: Ottawa Senators beat Columbus Blue Jackets, 7-3; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Bobby Ryan, Mika Zibanejad and Kyle Turris each had a goal and an assist, Erik Karlsson added a career-high four assists, and the Ottawa Senators beat the Blue Jackets, 7-3, in Columbus, Ohio.
